overview: Steve Goldner is a co-founder of Cresta Partners an innovative executive search and consulting firm focused on early to mid-stage technology companies. He has more than 30 years of operational experience and has served as Vice President of Engineering and Operations at a number of startups and public companies. Steve has extensive experience in development, quality assurance, IT and data center operations. He has participated in raising venture capital, IPOs as well as a number of mergers and acquisitions. He has held executive positions at Selectica, Active Decisions, Cascadeworks, i2 Technologies, Supplybase, Diffusion, Worldtalk, Polycom and Sun Microsystems. Steve has been an advisor to a number of private companies. He has a BSEE and a MSEE from the University of Michigan.
